Table of Contents

Name

gammawarp - lighten or darken an image

Synopsis

gammawarp inimage outimage gamma

Description

gammawarp lightens or darkens an image by changing the gamma. A gamma value that is less than 1.0 will lighten grey tones, while a gamma value that is greater that 1.0 will darken grey tones.

See Also

gamcal(6D) , gamma(6D)
